name: 2023 the 2nd International Conference on Mechatronics and Electrical Engineering
content: Publication: Accepted papers of MEEE 2023 after proper registration and presentation will be collected into MEEE 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services. MEEE 2023 is listed in IEEE Official Conference Calendar.
